duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead large-scale complex implementation leveraging Auth0/Okta CIC for Customer Identity and Access Management (CIAM)
Design and implement architectural deployment models for Auth0 components in relation to the overall Infrastructure, API, and Application integration
Review and assess current state architectural deployments, component integrations, workflows, and user base
Hand-on configuration activities in Auth0 and other infrastructure to ensure smooth CIAM integration

education_certification.credential: Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Network Security or related field (Master's preferred)
Certifications relevant to IAM platforms (Auth0, Azure AD, Okta, etc.)
